data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: If you could spend an entire day with a person from history, who would you choose, and why would you choose that person?
data.answer: I would choose Aristotle. I would ask him two things: How he was being mentored by Plato, and how was teaching Alexander the Great. Then I would show him what our civilization looks like. Finally, I think he would love to be taken to his birthplace, Stageira, to be shown the remnants of it. Finally, I would tell him that I admire him more than any other philosopher, say goodbye to him, and wake up super happy from my imaginary experience.
